title: zzzz
content: #scr{ width:93vw; .common { background-color: grey; width: 24vw padding: 0px; boeder:none; } .special{ background-color: green; width: 24vw padding: 0px; boeder:none; }   function do7() { scr.value=scr.value+"7" } function do8(){ scr.value=scr.value+"8" } function d09(){ scr.value=scr.value+"9" } function donumber(e){ scr.value=scr.value+e.value } function clearscr() { scr.value="" } function doequ() { temp=eval(scr.value) scr.value= temp.toPrecision(15) }
